details.python_command: python -u -c "import PyHipp as pyh; import DataProcessingTools as DPT; lfall = DPT.objects.processDirs(dirs=None, exclude=['*eye*','*mountains*'], objtype=pyh.FreqSpectrum, saveLevel=1); lfall.save(); hfall = DPT.objects.processDirs(dirs=None, exclude=['*eye*','*mountains*'], objtype=pyh.FreqSpectrum, loadHighPass=True, pointsPerWindow=3000, saveLevel=1); hfall.save();"
